comment.body:
Checklist of the specification:

1. ~~Basic program structure~~
2. ~~`Hello World` program~~
3. ~~Compiling and running of a program~~
4. ~~Command-line `mark` tip on `--help`.~~

Think I've missed something out? Leave a rely and I will add it.

This needs a lot of work.

Including collision control.

Something however is annoying me about it, its missing something other than that.
Okay. I can see your comment.

> [shevek](#comment_1_1FKv8ekYrPvVxZASX4Rk6EYQYpASnHaiXn): Just testing my zeroid...

Got a site yet?

> [shevek](#comment_1_1FKv8ekYrPvVxZASX4Rk6EYQYpASnHaiXn): Just testing my zeroid...

What do you think about the above proposal of a password generating system?

> [shevek](#comment_2_1FKv8ekYrPvVxZASX4Rk6EYQYpASnHaiXn): It would be very strange that such a function does not exists as Python library.

It does exist in Python. But it confused me the first time I used it. Or do you mean the module's name?
